reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major overgrowth syndromes: Beckwith-Wiedemann (~10 per 100k births), Sotos syndrome (~10 per 100k births), Simpson-Golabi-Behmel (~2 per 100k births), Weaver and others (~3 per 100k births). Estimate ~1.2 per 100k person-years based on incidence of new cases.
